data.message: Apply micro-patches for cancellation hardening: Applied: (1) Defensive None handling in duro_cancel_operation with (arguments or {}).get(), (2) Added request_cancel() on heavy tool timeout so zombie threads get the hint to stop. Noted for future: timestamped cancellation tokens to prevent sticky cancel flags if process dies before finally block.
data.outcome: Applied: (1) Defensive None handling in duro_cancel_operation with (arguments or {}).get(), (2) Added request_cancel() on heavy tool timeout so zombie threads get the hint to stop. Noted for future: timestamped cancellation tokens to prevent sticky cancel flags if process dies before finally block.
